  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 3.2s
  • Fixed Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 1.2s
  • Cast Delay: 1.4s
  • Range: 9
 Raise spikes from the ground to deal multiple hits of Earth property magic damage to a single target.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% MATK, 1 Spike.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% MATK, 2 Spike.
  • [Lv 3] : 200% MATK, 3 Spike.
  • [Lv 4] : 200% MATK, 4 Spike.
  • [Lv 5] : 200% MATK, 5 Spike.
Sense Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 10
  • Range: 9
 Reveal information about a monster.

Retrieve their level, current HP, size, race, attribute, DEF, MDEF and property damage table.


  • The information window will be shown to all party members.
Meteor Storm Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1) : 20
    • (Lv 2) : 24
    • (Lv 3) : 30
    • (Lv 4) : 34
    • (Lv 5) : 40
    • (Lv 6) : 44
    • (Lv 7) : 50
    • (Lv 8) : 54
    • (Lv 9) : 60
    • (Lv 10) : 64
  • Var. Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 6.3s
  • Fixed Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1s
  • Cooldown: 7s
  • Range: 9
 Drop down meteors in a 13x13 area of effect, dealing Fire property magic damage to all enemies that get hit.

Enemies hit have a chance to be stunned.


  • Meteors that drop down will hit all enemies within a 7x7 Area around the cell it lands.


  • [Lv 1] : 2 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 1 time, 3% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 2] : 3 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 1 time, 6% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 3] : 3 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 2 times, 9% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 4] : 4 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 2 times, 12% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 5] : 4 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 3 times, 15% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 6] : 5 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 3 times, 18% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 7] : 5 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 4 times, 21% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 8] : 6 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 4 times, 24% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv 9] : 6 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 5 times, 27% Chance to Stun.
  • [Lv10] : 7 Meteors, 125% MATK, Each meteor deals damage 5 times, 30% Chance to Stun.
Lord of Vermilion Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 56 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 4.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1s
  • Cooldown: 5s
  • Range: 9
 Call forth an explosive thunder bolt to destroy a 13x13 area of effect.

Deals a volley of 20 hits to all enemies in the area, dealing Wind property magic damage.

Also has a chance to inflict the Blind status for 20 seconds to enemies hit.


  • [Lv 1] : 500% MATK, 15% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 2] : 600% MATK, 20% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 3] : 700% MATK, 25% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% MATK, 30% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 5] : 900% MATK, 35% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 6] : 1000% MATK, 40% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 7] : 1100% MATK, 45% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 8] : 1200% MATK, 50% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv 9] : 1300% MATK, 55% Chance to Blind.
  • [Lv10] : 1400% MATK, 60% Chance to Blind.
Frost Nova Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 47 - (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 0.64s ~ 0.384s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.16s ~ 0.096s
  • Cast Delay: 0.2s
 Create an ice explosion around you in a 5x5 area of effect, dealing Water property magic damage to all enemies in range.

Additionally, inflict the Frozen status to enemies hit at a chance.


  • Frozen enemies can not be hit by this skill.


  • [Lv 1] : 73% MATK, Inflict 1.5 seconds of Frozen status, at a 38% Chance.
  • [Lv 2] : 80% MATK, Inflict 3.0 seconds of Frozen status, at a 43% Chance.
  • [Lv 3] : 87% MATK, Inflict 4.5 seconds of Frozen status, at a 48% Chance.
  • [Lv 4] : 93% MATK, Inflict 6.0 seconds of Frozen status, at a 53% Chance.
  • [Lv 5] : 100% MATK, Inflict 7.5 seconds of Frozen status, at a 58% Chance.
  • [Lv 6] : 107% MATK, Inflict 9.0 seconds of Frozen status, at a 63% Chance.
  • [Lv 7] : 113% MATK, Inflict 10.5 seconds of Frozen status, at a 68% Chance.
  • [Lv 8] : 120% MATK, Inflict 12.0 seconds of Frozen status, at a 73% Chance.
  • [Lv 9] : 127% MATK, Inflict 13.5 seconds of Frozen status, at a 78% Chance.
  • [Lv10] : 133% MATK, Inflict 15.0 seconds of Frozen status, at a 83% Chance.
Storm Gust Damage
  • Max Level: 10
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 78
  • Var. Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 6.3s
  • Fixed Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1s
  • Cooldown: 6s
  • Range: 9
 Summon an 11x11 area of effect blizzard that lasts for 4.5 seconds and hits all enemies in range for Water property magic damage every 0.45 seconds.

Additionally knock back all enemies hit by 2 cells, and has a chance to apply the Frozen status.


  • Frozen enemies can not be hit by this skill.


  • [Lv 1] : 120% MATK, 60% Chance to apply Frozen status.
  • [Lv 2] : 170% MATK, 55% Chance to apply Frozen status.
  • [Lv 3] : 220% MATK, 50% Chance to apply Frozen status.
  • [Lv 4] : 270% MATK, 45% Chance to apply Frozen status.
  • [Lv 5] : 320% MATK, 40% Chance to apply Frozen status.
  • [Lv 6] : 370% MATK, 35% Chance to apply Frozen status.
  • [Lv 7] : 420% MATK, 30% Chance to apply Frozen status.
  • [Lv 8] : 470% MATK, 25% Chance to apply Frozen status.
  • [Lv 9] : 520% MATK, 20% Chance to apply Frozen status.
  • [Lv10] : 570% MATK, 15% Chance to apply Frozen status.
Heaven's Drive Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 24 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 1.9s
  • Fixed Cast Time: ?.?s ~ 0.8s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cooldown: 1s
  • Range: 9
 Cause jagged spikes to rise up from the ground in a 5x5 area, hitting any enemies inside the area for multiple hits of Earth property magical damage.


  • If this skill hits a hidden target it will reveal them.


  • [Lv 1] : 125% MATK, Hits targets 1 time.
  • [Lv 2] : 250% MATK, Hits targets 2 time.
  • [Lv 3] : 375% MATK, Hits targets 3 time.
  • [Lv 4] : 500% MATK, Hits targets 4 time.
  • [Lv 5] : 625% MATK, Hits targets 5 time.
Quagmire Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 0 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 9
 Create a 5x5 mud bog that cuts the Movement Speed, AGI, and DEX of enemies that enter it by half.

Also removes the effects of Increase Agility, Two-Handed Quicken, and Adrenaline Rush type skills.


  • You can have up to 3 Quagmires active at a time.
  • AGI and DEX will only drop by a maximum of 50 each.
  • In PvP enviroments, allies and the caster can be affected as well, and players will only receive a 25% penalty to Movement Speed, AGI, and DEX instead.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 5 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 10 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 15 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 20 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 25 seconds.
Sight Blaster Damage
  • Platinum Skill
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 80
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.28s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.32s
 Call forth a protective fire ball that lasts for up to 15 minutes.

If an enemy walks within a 3x3 area of the caster, it deals 600% Fire property magic damage, and knocks them back 3 cells.


  • The knockback effect is disabled in BG/WoE.
 Warlock Skill Tree
Warlock
[ Skill ] [ Type ] [ Properties ] [ Description ]
Radius Passive
  • Max Level: 3
 Increase the casting range of Warlock skills, and reduce their Fixed Casting Time as well.


  • [Lv 1] : +1 Cell range, -10% Fixed Casting Time.
  • [Lv 2] : +2 Cell range, -15% Fixed Casting Time.
  • [Lv 3] : +3 Cell range, -20% Fixed Casting Time.
Marsh of Abyss Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 38 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.5s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Range: 11
 Curse a target for 30 seconds to reduce their Movement Speed, DEF, and Flee.


  • The reduction of DEF and Flee are increased based on the caster's Job Level and INT.
  • This skill will remove Increase Agility, Wind Walk, and ASPD potions.


  • [Lv 1] : -50% Movement Speed.
  • [Lv 2] : -60% Movement Speed.
  • [Lv 3] : -70% Movement Speed.
  • [Lv 4] : -80% Movement Speed.
  • [Lv 5] : -90% Movement Speed.
Summon Fire Ball Support
  • Max Level: 2
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
 Summon a Fire elemental ball that will float around you, and continuously drain SP while active.

The Fire ball can later be thrown at an enemy using Release, where it will deal Fire property magic damage to a single target.


  • A Maximum of 5 elemental balls can be summoned at a time.


These elemental balls can also be used for Tetra Vortex to make one of the skills hits deal Fire property magic damage.


  • [Lv 1] : Summons 1 elemental ball, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Summons 5 elemental balls, Duration 280 seconds.
Summon Lightning Ball Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
 Summon a Lightning elemental ball that will float around you, and continuously drain SP while active.

The Lightning ball can later be thrown at an enemy using Release, where it will deal Wind property magic damage to a single target.


  • A Maximum of 5 elemental balls can be summoned at a time.


These elemental balls can also be used for Tetra Vortex to make one of the skills hits deal Wind property magic damage.


  • [Lv 1] : Summons 1 elemental ball, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Summons 5 elemental balls, Duration 280 seconds.
Summon Water Ball Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
 Summon a Water elemental ball that will float around you, and continuously drain SP while active.

The Water ball can later be thrown at an enemy using Release, where it will deal Water property magic damage to a single target.


  • A Maximum of 5 elemental balls can be summoned at a time.


These elemental balls can also be used for Tetra Vortex to make one of the skills hits deal Water property magic damage.


  • [Lv 1] : Summons 1 elemental ball, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Summons 5 elemental balls, Duration 280 seconds.
Summon Stone Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 2 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
 Summon an Earth elemental ball that will float around you, and continuously drain SP while active.

The Earth ball can later be thrown at an enemy using Release, where it will deal Earth property magic damage to a single target.


  • A Maximum of 5 elemental balls can be summoned at a time.


These elemental balls can also be used for Tetra Vortex to make one of the skills hits deal Earth property magic damage.


  • [Lv 1] : Summons 1 elemental ball, Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Summons 5 elemental balls, Duration 280 seconds.
Release Damage
  • Max Level: 2
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost:
    • (Lv 1) : 3
    • (Lv 2) : 20
  • Range: 11
  • Cast Delay: Equal to the skill stored
 Allows you to release stored magic, or fling elemental balls at targets.


  • Skills stored still have the same cast delay as the normal skill.
  • Elemental ball damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, and Job Level.


  • [Lv 1] : Instantly cast a randomly selected spell that was stored with Reading Spellbook. If there are no spells stored, use one elemental ball to strike a target.
  • [Lv 2] : Release all summoned elemental balls to strike a target with magic damage of the elemental ball type.
Reading Spellbook Support
  • Max Level: 1
  • Target: Passive, Self
  • SP Cost: 40
  • Var. Cast Time: 5.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
 Allows you to read Spell Books to store spells in your mind, letting you later use them with Release to cast the spell instantly.


To store a spell you must put the Spell Book item in your skill hotkey bar and use it as if it is a consumable. (It will not be consumed, and there is a different book for each skill).
Each spell stored will take a different amount of Mind Slots, which determines the amount of spells you can hold.


  • The number of spells you can store is determined by your INT, Base Level, Freezing Spell level and the spells you are trying to store.


8 Mind Slots

  •  Spell Book (Drain Life)


10 Mind Slots

  •  Spell Book (Lord of Vermilion)
  •  Spell Book (Meteor Storm)
  •  Spell Book (Storm Gust)


12 Mind Slots

  •  Spell Book (Jack Frost)
  •  Spell Book (Earth Strain)
  •  Spell Book (Crimson Rock)
  •  Spell Book (Chain Lightning)


22 Mind Slots

  •  Spell Book (Comet)
  •  Spell Book (Tetra Vortex)


The formula to calculate mind slots is:
(Freezing Spell Level × 4) + Floor(Base Level ÷ 10) + Floor(Total INT ÷ 10)

Freezing Spell Passive
  • Max Level: 10
 Increase the number of Mind Slots available.


  • Mind Slots determine the amount of spells you can store using Reading Spellbook.
  • You can find you total mind slots and currently held spells with the @battlestats command ingame.


  • [Lv 1] : +8 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 2] : +16 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 3] : +24 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 4] : +32 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 5] : +40 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 6] : +48 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 7] : +56 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 8] : +64 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv 9] : +72 Mind Slots.
  • [Lv10] : +80 Mind Slots.


The formula to calculate mind slots is:
(Freezing Spell Level × 4) + Floor(Base Level ÷ 10) + Floor(Total INT ÷ 10)

Frost Misty Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 32 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 0.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 8.0s
 Create a shower of Icy Mist around an area, dealing Water property magic damage to all enemies in range, also has a chance to inflict 10 seconds of the Frost status.

Targets with the Frost status will take additional damage from Jack Frost.


  • Target's affected by the Frost status will have reduced Movement Speed, DEF, and increased Fixed Casting Time.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 300% MATK, 30% Chance to apply Frost status, 3x3 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% MATK, 35% Chance to apply Frost status, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 500% MATK, 40% Chance to apply Frost status, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 600% MATK, 45% Chance to apply Frost status, 9x9 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 700% MATK, 50% Chance to apply Frost status, 11x11 Area of Effect.


This skills damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Sienna Execrate Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 30 + (2 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Range: 7
  • Consumes: 2  Red Gemstone
 Attempt to inflict the Stone Curse status to all enemies within a chosen area.


  • The chance of Stone Curse is increased based on the casters Job Level.


  • [Lv 1] : Inflict Stone Curse for 10 seconds, 3x3 Area of Effect, 48% Base Chance to apply Stone Curse status.
  • [Lv 2] : Inflict Stone Curse for 12 seconds, 3x3 Area of Effect, 56% Base Chance to apply Stone Curse status.
  • [Lv 3] : Inflict Stone Curse for 14 seconds, 5x5 Area of Effect, 64% Base Chance to apply Stone Curse status.
  • [Lv 4] : Inflict Stone Curse for 16 seconds, 5x5 Area of Effect, 72% Base Chance to apply Stone Curse status.
  • [Lv 5] : Inflict Stone Curse for 18 seconds, 7x7 Area of Effect, 80% Base Chance to apply Stone Curse status.
Drain Life Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 16 + (4 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 2.0s
  • Range: 11
 Deal Neutral property magic damage to a single target, with a chance to leech health from them and heal yourself for a portion of the damage dealt.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, and INT.
  • The amount of Health leeched is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 200% MATK, 74% Chance to Leech, 8% of damage leeched as HP.
  • [Lv 2] : 400% MATK, 78% Chance to Leech, 16% of damage leeched as HP.
  • [Lv 3] : 600% MATK, 82% Chance to Leech, 24% of damage leeched as HP.
  • [Lv 4] : 800% MATK, 86% Chance to Leech, 32% of damage leeched as HP.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% MATK, 90% Chance to Leech, 40% of damage leeched as HP.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [{Base_Damage + INT} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Amount of health absorbed is based on the following formula;
HP Absorb = [Base_HP_Absorb × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Crimson Rock Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 50 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 5.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 5.0s
  • Range: 11
 Call forth a large meteor to strike a target and all enemies in a 7x7 surrounding area, dealing Fire property magic damage.

All targets hit by the meteor will be knocked back 3 cells.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 1300% MATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 1900% MATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 2500% MATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 3100% MATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 3700% MATK.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [{Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)}]%

Chain Lightning Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 70 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3s + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 3.0s
  • Range: 11
 Strike a target with lightning that deals Wind property magic damage and will bounce between nearby enemies around the target.


The lightning will hit a single target 4 times. But if there are enemies nearby the target, the lightning will instead bounce between them multiple times.

  • [One Target] : Deals damage 4 times.
  • [Many Targets] : Deals damage 5~9 times split among all nearby enemies.


  • [Lv 1] : 600% MATK, Lightning bounces 5 times.
  • [Lv 2] : 700% MATK, Lightning bounces 6 times.
  • [Lv 3] : 800% MATK, Lightning bounces 7 times.
  • [Lv 4] : 900% MATK, Lightning bounces 8 times.
  • [Lv 5] : 1000% MATK, Lightning bounces 9 times.
Soul Expansion Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 25 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Range: 11
 Hit an enemy and enemies in the area around them twice with Ghost property magic damage.


  • Enemies inside White Imprison, will take double damage from this skill.
  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level, and INT.


  • [Lv 1] : 1200% MATK, 3x3 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 1400% MATK, 3x3 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 1600% MATK, 3x3 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 1800% MATK, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 2000% MATK, 5x5 Area of Effect.


Damage is based on this formula;
Damage (MATK) = [{Base_Damage + INT} × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Jack Frost Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.5s + (0.5 x Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cooldown: 4.0s
 Call forth a massive area of Icicles from the ground, hitting a large area around the target. Dealing Water property magic damage, bonus damage is applied if the target is under the Frost status.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 1300% MATK, (1800% MATK) if Frost status, 5x5 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 1600% MATK, (2400% MATK) if Frost status, 7x7 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 1900% MATK, (3000% MATK) if Frost status, 9x9 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 2200% MATK, (3600% MATK) if Frost status, 11x11 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 2500% MATK, (4200% MATK) if Frost status, 13x13 Area of Effect.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Normal Damage (MATK) = [Base_Damage × (BaseLevel ÷ 100)]%

Stasis Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 40 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 170s + (10 x Skill Level)
 In a massive area around you, completely seal off the usage of any skills from characters in the area.


  • This skill affects yourself, allies, and enemies.
  • This skills affect is reduced by the targets DEX, and VIT.


  • [Lv 1] : 5 second Base duration, 19x19 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 10 second Base duration, 21x21 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 15 second Base duration, 23x23 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 20 second Base duration, 25x25 Area of Effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 25 second Base duration, 27x27 Area of Effect.


Duration of the effect is based on this formula;
Effect Duration = [5 + {Base_Duration − (Target_VIT + Target_DEX) ÷ 20}] seconds

Hell Inferno Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 60 + (6 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 3.0s
  • Range: 11
 Deal 2 hits at the same time, one for Fire property magic damage, and the other for Shadow property magic damage in a small area around a target.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 400% MATK (Fire), 600% MATK (Shadow), 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 800% MATK (Fire), 1200% MATK (Shadow), 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 1200% MATK (Fire), 1800% MATK (Shadow), 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 1600% MATK (Fire), 2400% MATK (Shadow), 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 2000% MATK (Fire), 3000% MATK (Shadow), 5x5 Area of effect.
Earth Strain Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 62 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1s + (Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 7.0s
  • Range: 6
 Raise the land in a moving wave toward one direction, dealing Earth property magic damage to all enemies hit.


  • [Lv 1] : 1600% MATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 2200% MATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 2800% MATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 3400% MATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 4000% MATK.
White Imprison Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 45 + (5 x Skill Level)
  • Cool Down: 4.0s
  • Range: 11
 Imprison a single target in a transparent box, preventing them from moving or using skills and items for a short time.


  • While imprisoned, only Ghost property attacks can damage the target, they will also immediately end White Imprison.
  • When White Imprison ends normally, it will deal Fixed irreducible damage to the target that was trapped.
  • White Imprison can be cast on yourself, if it is, it will always be successful and last 5 seconds regardless of skill level.
  • White Imprison does not work against Boss monsters.


  • [Lv 1] : 50% Chance to imprison target, Duration 10 seconds, 400 Fixed irreducible damage.
  • [Lv 2] : 60% Chance to imprison target, Duration 12 seconds, 800 Fixed irreducible damage.
  • [Lv 3] : 70% Chance to imprison target, Duration 14 seconds, 1200 Fixed irreducible damage.
  • [Lv 4] : 80% Chance to imprison target, Duration 16 seconds, 1600 Fixed irreducible damage.
  • [Lv 5] : 90% Chance to imprison target, Duration 18 seconds, 2000 Fixed irreducible damage.
Comet Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 400 + (80 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 5s + (Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.5s
  • Cool Down: 20.0s
  • Range: 11
 Drop a massive 13x13 Comet from the depths of space, dealing Neutral property magic damage to all enemies in range.

All targets hit will also receive 'Magic Intoxication' status for 20 seconds. While under this status targets will have -50% resistance to All Properties of attacks.


  • This skills damage is increased based on the casters Base Level.


  • [Lv 1] : 3200% MATK.
  • [Lv 2] : 3900% MATK.
  • [Lv 3] : 4600% MATK.
  • [Lv 4] : 5300% MATK.
  • [Lv 5] : 6000% MATK.


Damage is based on the following formula;
Damage (MATK) = [(Base_Damage × Base_Level ÷ 100)]%

Tetra Vortex Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 90 + (30 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4s + (Skill Level)
  • Fixed Cast Time: 2.0s
  • Cast Delay: 2.0s
  • Cool Down: 15.0s
  • Range: 11
 Strike a small area around a target with the power of the core elements. This damage is divided into 4 hits, each hit will take the elemental property from on of the consumed elemental balls used to cast the skill.


  • This spell requires you to have 4 elemental balls summoned, and consumes them all on cast.


You can mix the elements of this spell,
For example if you used Fire, Fire, Water, Wind element balls to cast the spell, it would deal Fire damage on the first and second hit, Water damage on the third, and Wind on the fourth hit.


  • [Lv 1] : 1200% MATK per hit, 1x1 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 2] : 1600% MATK per hit, 1x1 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 3] : 2000% MATK per hit, 1x1 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 4] : 2400% MATK per hit, 1x1 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 5] : 2800% MATK per hit, 1x1 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 6] : 3200% MATK per hit, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 7] : 3600% MATK per hit, 3x3 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 8] : 4000% MATK per hit, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv 9] : 4400% MATK per hit, 5x5 Area of effect.
  • [Lv10] : 4800% MATK per hit, 7x7 Area of effect.


Each element of Tetra Vortex also has a chance to apply a different status effect on the target.

  • [Fire Element] -- Burning status
  • [Wind Element] -- Stun status
  • [Water Element] -- Freezing status
  • [Earth Element] -- Bleeding status
Intense Telekinesis Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 50 + (50 x Skill Level)
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 300.0s
 Sharpen your mind to greatly enhance your Ghost magic damage for 60 seconds. Multiplying Ghost property magic damage while also decreasing their Variable Casting Time and SP Consumption.


  • This skill can not be removed with Clearance , or Dispel.
  • The effects of this skill only apply to Ghost property skills.


  • [Lv 1] : +40% Ghost property magic damage, -10% Variable Cast Time, -10% SP Consumption.
  • [Lv 2] : +80% Ghost property magic damage, -20% Variable Cast Time, -20% SP Consumption.
  • [Lv 3] : +120% Ghost property magic damage, -30% Variable Cast Time, -30% SP Consumption.
  • [Lv 4] : +160% Ghost property magic damage, -40% Variable Cast Time, -40% SP Consumption.
  • [Lv 5] : +200% Ghost property magic damage, -50% Variable Cast Time, -50% SP Consumption.
Recognized Spell Support
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Self
  • SP Cost: 80 + (20 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.0s
  • Cast Delay: 1.0s
  • Cool Down: 20s + (30 x Skill Level)
 Increase you damage capabilities by always using the highest possible MATK variance, letting you deal the maximum amount of magical damage every time you cast a skill.

However, it also increases the SP Consumption of all skills by 25%.


  • [Lv 1] : Duration 60 seconds.
  • [Lv 2] : Duration 90 seconds.
  • [Lv 3] : Duration 120 seconds.
  • [Lv 4] : Duration 150 seconds.
  • [Lv 5] : Duration 180 seconds.

Crimson Arrow Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 32 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 0.3s
  • AP Recovery: 2
 Fires the flame arrow to deal fire property magical damage to the target and all enemies in the straight line. When the flame arrow hit the target it will explode, dealing fire property magical damage to the target and surrounding enemies around the target.


Deals additional damage depends on user's base level and SPL.
If there is Climax buff, doubles damage of the explosion hit (regardless of Climax level used).


  • [Lv 1] : 300% Matk / Explosion damage : 600% Matk / area of effect : 5 x 5 cells.
  • [Lv 2] : 600% Matk / Explosion damage : 1200% Matk / area of effect : 5 x 5 cells.
  • [Lv 3] : 900% Matk / Explosion damage : 1800% Matk / area of effect : 5 x 5 cells.
  • [Lv 4] : 1200% Matk / Explosion damage : 2400% Matk / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 5] : 1500% Matk / Explosion damage : 3000% Matk / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
All Bloom Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 32 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1s
  • Cool Down: 6s
 Summons the flower garden on the ground, the fiery flower buds explode on the skill area randomly for the skill duration.


The flower bud explosion deals fire property magical damage to all targets 7 x 7 cells. Deals additional damage depends on user's base level and SPL.


The effect of skill will be changed depends on level of Climax used.
Climax (Level 1)
Reduces flower bud spawning interval by half.
Climax (Level 2)
Reduces skill damage but 2 flower buds explode simultaneously.
Climax (Level 3)
Increases All Bloom damage by 100%.
Climax (Level 4)
No flower bud appears but all targets within range of flower garden will take more damage from fire property by 100% for 30 seconds.
Climax (Level 5)
Upon all flower buds explode, deals 7000% Matk as fire property to all targets within flower garden.

  • [Lv 1] : 100% Matk / flower bud : 4 / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 2] : 200% Matk / flower bud : 8 / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 3] : 300% Matk / flower bud : 12 / area of effect : 9 x 9 cells.
  • [Lv 4] : 400% Matk / flower bud : 16 / area of effect : 9 x 9 cells.
  • [Lv 5] : 500% Matk / flower bud : 20 / area of effect : 9 x 9 cells.

  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s

Deals additional damage depends on user's base level and SPL. If there is Climax buff, the skill will deal more damage (regardless of Climax level used).

Crystal Impact Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Around the caster
  • SP Cost: 32 + (8 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1s
  • Cool Down: 6s
 Creates the powerful wave of water from the ground under the user feet to deals water property magical damage to all targets within the skill range.

Target attacked by the ice wave will take additional water property magical damage after a while.


Climax (Level 1)
Gives the user and the allies within the skill range take less damage from water property by 30%, Def + 300, Mdef + 100 and water property magical damage bonus by 30% for 900 seconds.
Climax (Level 2)
Adds 1 more hit of ice wave .
Climax (Level 3)
Increases ice wave damage by 50%.
Climax (Level 4)
Reduces ice wave damage but increases aftershock damage by 150%.
Climax (Level 5)
Increases area of effect of ice wave to the entire screen, adds the area of effect of aftershock damage by 5 x 5 cells.

  • [Lv 1] : 800% Matk / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 2] : 1600% Matk / area of effect : 9 x 9 cells.
  • [Lv 3] : 2400% Matk / area of effect : 11 x 11 cells.
  • [Lv 4] : 3200% Matk / area of effect : 13 x 13 cells.
  • [Lv 5] : 4000% Matk / area of effect : 15 x 15 cells.

Destructive Hurricane Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Around the caster
  • SP Cost: 50 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1s
  • Cool Down: 6s
 Creates the powerful wind on the target area to deals wind property magical damage to all targets within the skill range.


Deals additional damage depends on user's base level and SPL. The effect of skill will be changed depends on level of Climax used.

Climax (Level 1)
Adds an additional hit that deal 500% Matk as wind property.
Climax (Level 2)
Adds 2 cells knock-back inflicting effect.
Climax (Level 3)
Increases Destructive Hurricane damage by 100%.
Climax (Level 4)
Destructive Hurricane doesn't deal damage but the skill will gives the user Matk + 100 and wind property magical damage bonus by 30% for 900 seconds.
Climax (Level 5)
Increases area of effect to 19 x 19 cells and increases Destructive Hurricane damage by 70%.

  • [Lv 1] : 1600% Matk / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 2] : 3200% Matk / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 3] : 4800% Matk / area of effect : 9 x 9 cells.
  • [Lv 4] : 6400% Matk / area of effect : 9 x 9 cells.
  • [Lv 5] : 8000% Matk / area of effect : 11 x 11 cells.
Strantum Tremor Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 50 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 3s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 0.5s
  • Cool Down: 5s
 Shakes the ground to deals earth property magical damage to the targets within skill range.


Deals additional damage depends on user's base level and SPL.


  • [Lv 1] : 250% Matk / area of effect : 5 x 5 cells.
  • [Lv 2] : 500% Matk / area of effect : 5 x 5 cells.
  • [Lv 3] : 750% Matk / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 4] : 1000% Matk / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 5] : 1250% Matk / area of effect : 9 x 9 cells.
Rock Down Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Enemy
  • SP Cost: 50 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1s
  • Cool Down: 4s
  • AP Recovery: 2
 Drops the large rock on the target, deals earth property magical damage to the target and surrounding enemies around the target.


Deals additional damage depends on user's base level and SPL. If there is Climax buff, the skill will deal more damage (regardless of Climax level used).


  • [Lv 1] : 600% Matk / 850% Matk (Climax) / area of effect : 5 x 5 cells.
  • [Lv 2] : 1200% Matk / 1700% Matk (Climax) / area of effect : 5 x 5 cells.
  • [Lv 3] : 1800% Matk / 2550% Matk (Climax) / area of effect : 5 x 5 cells.
  • [Lv 4] : 2400% Matk / 3400% Matk (Climax) / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 5] : 3000% Matk / 4250% Matk (Climax) / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
Violent Quake Damage
  • Max Level: 5
  • Target: Ground
  • SP Cost: 50 + (10 x Skill Level)
  • Var. Cast Time: 4s
  • Fixed Cast Time: 1.5s
  • Cast Delay: 1s
  • Cool Down: 6s
 Summons the earthquake on the ground, the rocks rise on the skill area randomly for the skill duration.


The rock deals earth property magical damage to all targets within 7 x 7 cells. Deals additional damage depends on user's base level and SPL. The effect of skill will be changed depends on level of Climax used.


Climax (Level 1) Reduces skill damage but 2 rocks rise simultaneously. Climax (Level 2) Increases rock's attack range to 9 x 9 cells. Climax (Level 3) Increases Violent Quake damage by 100%. Climax (Level 4) No rock appears but all targets within range of earthquake will take more damage from earth property by 100% for 30 seconds. Climax (Level 5) Fixes area of effect to 7 x 7 cells.

  • [Lv 1] : 120% Matk / number of rock : 4 / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 2] : 240% Matk / number of rock : 8 / area of effect : 7 x 7 cells.
  • [Lv 3] : 360% Matk / number of rock : 12 / area of effect : 9 x 9 cells.
  • [Lv 4] : 480% Matk / number of rock : 16 / area of effect : 9 x 9 cells.
  • [Lv 5] : 600% Matk / number of rock : 20 / area of effect : 9 x 9 cells.


[ Update ] https://ro.gnjoy.com/news/devnote/View.asp?category=1&seq=4139190&curpage=1

Gears

This category is in WIP
Let me show you the best equipments 

 [ Top Headgear ]
[ Upper Headgear ]
Item Item Type Required lvl Obtain from Notes
 Paradise Hat [Armor] 10 Eden Academy Your first Hat/headgear which has a Matk growth equivalent to your Base Level.
 Advanced Paradise Hat [Armor] 100 Eden Academy Good Amount of Matk and HP / SP recovery when dealing damage (Good sustain early game)
 Magic Stone Hat [1] [Armor] 100 3rd Job Change Reward It's free but gives way lesser than Advance paradise, better use eden instead.
 Ordinary Black Magician Hat [1] [Armor] 100 Cash Shop A decent approach in early-mid game to attain early MDEF Bypass when other sources are hard to obtain
 Ordinary Black Magician Hat EVT [1] [Armor] 100 Cash Shop Same as the one from above but these one is as easier to get and to refine as long as you have Tokens
 Apple Of Archer [1] [Armor] 1 Mob drops The classic apple for small dex bonus on early game
 'Drooping Neko Crew [1] [Armor] 1 Cash Shop Mostly only obtained through cash shop or player market, gives average amount of Matk and MDEF Bypass that works on all builds but not BiS.
 Wickebine's Black Cat Ears [Armor] 45 Cash Shop Cheap and Cheat way of obtaining 100% Full Bypass as long as you can proc it continuously (Chain lightning does very good at it)
 Crown Of Deceit [1] [Armor] 85 Cash Shop Good early headgear that gives ACD and VCT, although it consumes 2 headslots so think wisely before getting it.
 Celine's Ribbon [1] [Armor] 1 Cash Shop End-Game Headgear but use-able in early so it's still useful and a must have if wishing to use the full Celine set (also Enchantable)
 Vibrant Rose [1] [Armor] 1 Cash Shop Early-Game Headgear, Relatively cheap and easy to obtain very early on and it is enchantable as well.
 Ceremonial Crown GC/EVT [1] [Armor] 130 Endeavor Tokens Gives a suitable amount of raw matk even at just +6, and also gives fct when refined to +11
 Antiquity Cap GC/EVT [1] [Armor] 130 Endeavor Tokens Completely Identical to Ceremonial Crown and Celestrial Coronet, Just different Combo purposes
 Celestial Coronet GC/EVT [1] [Armor] 130 Endeavor Tokens Completely Identical to Ceremonial Crown and Antiquity Cap, Just different Combo purposes
 Spell Circuit GC [1] [Armor] 1 Cash Shop An old relic and a lesser version of of the gc/evt hats above but still quite useful in early/mid
 Zaha Doll Hat [1] [Armor] 1 Cash Shop Good beginner headgear, best for skills that does high dps like Chain Lightning to proc its effect for full potential damage increase
 Skull Cap [1] [Armor] 10 Cash Shop Best when used with thorn of darkness otherwise still good average source of matk
 Heart Wing Headband EVT [1] [Armor] 50 Endeavor Tokens Only used when lacking of acd on a specific middle ground builds, otherwise dont invest to it for later time
 Amistr Beret EVT [1] [Armor] 1 Endeavor Tokens Mostly used for AB's but still gives suitable amount of matk, only if you dont have any other options or if you already have it before.

 [ Armor ]

Item Item Type Required lvl Obtain from Notes
 Orlean's Gown [1] [Armor] 55 Mob Drops Makes your casting uninterruptible, good for early and for leveling.
 Advanced Paradise Robe [Armor] 100 Eden Academy An armor the scales with your level, a must to have when starting/leveling.
 Illusion Armor B-type [1] [Armor] 130 Episode 17.1 - Illusion This is where your powerspike begins,you will need this to upgrade to Auto equipments.
 Robust Magical Armor [1] [Armor] 1 Monster Hunter Also good for early boost because you can wear it from level 1.
 Hero Magic Coat [1] [Armor] 160 Bios Island
Morse Cave 		Enchantable but it gives stats are lacking and only 3rd job can wear it.
 Flattery Robe [1] [Armor] 100 Banquet for Heroes Gives a huge amount of Matk and you gain more if you are lvl 175+
 Automatic Armor B-type [1] [Armor] 160 Episode 17.2 - Sage's Legacy The Current Meta armors now after being upgraded from Illusion armors.
 Diabolus Robe [1] [Armor] 55 Mob Drops Alternative early armors that you can use while you dont have a proper one (can be paired with the ring and is enchantable)
 Celine's Dress [1] [Armor] 130 Nightmare Toy Factory A good alternative End-game gear but requires the entire set to use.
 Geffen Magic Robe [1] [Armor] 99 Geffen Magic Tournament Enchantable and Casting cannot be interrupted.
 Lava Leather Robe [1] [Armor] 100 Magma Dungeon Floor 3 Alot of raw Matk starting from +100 and gives more at +7 > +9 refine.
 Int Soutane [1] [Armor] 170 Odin Temple Floor 4 Not really necessary at End-game but good for Mid-game if you don't have the proper armor yet.
 Kafra Uniform [1] [Armor] 0 Eden Academy Beginner/Starter gears handed out for free, they are also enchantable and slotted.
 Purple Dragon Plate [1] [Armor] 170 Abyss Dungeon 4 Best of all worlds giving alot of good stats and the only armor that gives fct and it's also enchantable.
 Crimson Robe [1] [Armor] 100 Magma Dungeon Floor 3 Only works with the entire set, just for memes no more no less.
 Noblesse Crimson Robe [1] [Armor] 100 Eden Academy Phase 1 armor after Advance Eden set (Must Have for CR oriented Build)
 Imperial Crimson Robe [1] [Armor] 125 Eden Academy Phase 2 armor after Noblesse set (Must Have for CR oriented Build)
 Grace Crimson Robe [1] [Armor] 150 Eden Academy Phase 3 armor after Imperial set (Must Have for CR oriented Build)
 Noblesse Frost Robe [1] [Armor] 100 Eden Academy Phase 1 armor after Advance Eden set (Must Have for JF oriented Build)
 Imperial Frost Robe [1] [Armor] 125 Eden Academy Phase 2 armor after Noblesse set (Must Have for JF oriented Build)
 Grace Frost Robe [1] [Armor] 150 Eden Academy Phase 3 armor after Imperial set (Must Have for JF oriented Build)
 Gray Wolf Robe [1] [Armor] 190 Episode 18 Direction of Prayer One of the Future Late game armors after 4th jobs
 Rune Robe of Death [1] [Armor] 230 Varmundt's Biosphere One of the Future Late game armors after 4th jobs
 Nebula Robe of Spell [1] [Armor] 240 Constellation Tower Future Equipment from Constellation Tower which is the Upgraded version of Endless Tower.

Builds

leave with a bang! make it flashy!

PvE

  • Comet [Updated as of: 03/17/23]★
Stage 1 [ Eden + Advance Eden ]

or  Paradise Hat

or  Well-Chewed Pencil

or  Paradise Wizard Staff
or  Paradise Wizard Wand

or Any Slotted Midgear you can get your hands on

▶ Skills

Comet Skill Build Notes 
Mage

  • This Skill Build focuses on Firewall and Safetywall, the rest are just pre-requisite counts.
Wizard

  • This Skill Build focuses on Frost Nova and Mystical Amplification, Soul Drain as well.
Warlock

  • This Skill Build focuses on Comet and Soul Expansion and Full throttle for emergencies.

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Rutilus Stick-OS [1]

 Normal Weapon Modifier (magical) (Best Enchants to get are the following below:)

  • Matk + 5~20
  • Matk + 1~5%
  • Decreases variable cast time by 3~10%
  • Increases magical damage to medium size enemies by 3~10%
  • Increases damage against large size enemies by 3~10%

 Sunflower Boy [2]

  •  Spell 4 ~ 6 (x2)
  • MATK + 1~2%
  •  INT +3 ~ 6
  •  DEX +1 ~ 3

 Giant Snake Skin [1]

  •  Special Int
  •  INT +1 ~ 7
  •  DEX +1 ~ 7

 Fallen Angel Wings [1]

  •  Spell 4 ~ 7 (x3)

 Flattery Robe [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 3 (x2)

 Cursed Knight Shield [1]

 Silver Angel Idol (Best Enchants to get are the following below:)

  • Increase Magical Damage Against [Race]
  • Reduce Variable Cast Time 1 ~ 5 %
  • Increase ASPD 1 ~ 5 %

 Illusion Silver Guard [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Temporal Boots Of Dexterity [1]

  •  Spell 2 ~ 5 or  ASPD Lv. 1 ~ 4
  •  Runaway Magic

▶ Stats:

STR: 20 ▷ (If you're planning to put this on 0, i am advising you to atleast get x10 Gym passes to compensate for weights)
AGI: 100 ▷ (Having an Average of 175 ASPD and above bypasses alot of animation locks and spams)
VIT: 90 ▷ Focus me 3rd (Survivabilty)
INT: 120 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 120 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 36 ▷ (A little punch of few raw Matk)

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Old Magic Stone Hat [1]

  •  Magic Essence Lv. 1 ~ 5
  •  DEX +1 ~ 5 (x2) or  INT +1 ~ 5 (x2)

 Illusion Morpheus' Hood [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Welding Wand [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • Matk 5 ~ 45
  • Matk% 1 ~ 10%

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increase magic damage to [any element] enemies 3 ~ 20%

3rd Line Enchant

  • Increase magic damage to normal enemies 3 ~ 20%
  • Increase magic damage to boss enemies 3 ~ 20%

 Illusion Thorn Staff of Darkness [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • MATK + 5 ~ 50
  • MATK + 1 ~ 10%

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increases Magical Damage against Medium Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Large Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Reduces After Cast Delay by 1~10%

3rd Line Enchant

  • Any Enchant

4th Line Enchant

  • Magical Damage to Boss Monsters + 1% ~ 15%
  • Magical Damage to Normal Monsters + 1% ~ 15%

 Illusion Engine Wing B-type [1]

  •  Modification Orb (Fast) (x2)
  •  Modification Orb (Above All)

 Illusion Battle Chip R [1]

  •  Spell 5
  •  ASPD Lv. 4
  •  Modification Orb (Magic Healing)

 Magic Intensifier Ring [1]

  • Matk 1 ~ 3% (x2)

 Illusion Leg B-type [1]

  •  Modification Orb (Fixed Casting)
  •  Modification Orb (Spell Buster)
  •  Modification Orb (Vital)

 Magical Booster [1]

  • Matk 1~5
  • Matk 1~3%

 Illusion Armor B-type [1]

  •  Modification Orb (Magic) (x2)
  •  Modification Orb (Delay after skill)

 Illusion Battle Chip L [1]

  •  Spell 5
  •  ASPD Lv. 4
  •  Modification Orb (Magic Soul)
  • Alternatively you can go INT or DEX (x3)

 Temporal Boots Of Dexterity [1]

  •  Spell 2 ~ 5 or  ASPD Lv. 1 ~ 4
  •  Runaway Magic

 Illusion Silver Guard [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Purified Knight's Shield [1]

1st Line Enchant

  • Increase Magical Damage Against [Race] 1 ~ 5 %

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increase Magical Damage Against [Race] 1 ~ 5 %
  • Increase ASPD 1 ~ 5 %

3rd Line Enchant

  • Bypass Magical Defense of Normal Monster 30 ~ 60 %
  • Bypass Magical Defense of Boss Monster 30 ~ 60 %

 King Schmidt's Divine Power Insignia [1]

  •  Divine Power
  •  Spell 4 ~ 5
  •  DEX +3 ~ 5 or  INT +3 ~ 5

Stats:

STR: 10 ▷ (Again If you're planning to put this on 0, i am advising you to atleast get x10 Gym passes to compensate for weights)
AGI: 120 ▷ (With the right amount of consumables and party buffs you should be able to get 190+ ASPD)
VIT: 100 ▷ Focus me 3rd (Tanky enough for End-game instances)
INT: 120 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 120 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 59 ▷ (A few more punches of raw Matk)

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Old Magic Stone Hat [1]

  •  Magic Essence Lv. 1 ~ 5

  •  DEX+ 2 ~ 3 or  INT +2 ~ 3

or Any Slotted Midgear you can get your hands on

or +9  Imperial Crimson Robe [1]

or +9  Imperial Magic Boots

or  Int Glove [1]

R Hand:  Red Pitaya Card or  Soul Fragment Card or  Colorful Teddy Bear Card or  Regenschirm Scientist Card

Garment: Nightmare Ancient Mummy Card or  Marsh Arclouse Card

L Acc:  Mavka Card or  Scaraba Card

▶ Stats:

STR: 20 ▷ (Only for Weight)
AGI: 70 ▷ (What's left of the points / or put everything on int/dex/vit above 90-100)
VIT: 90 ▷ Focus me 3rd (Survivabilty)
INT: 120 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 120 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 0 ▷ (Still Not important at the moment, feel free to ignore for now)

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Cursed Knight Shield [1]

 Silver Angel Idol (Best Enchants to get are the following below:)

  • Increase Magical Damage Against [Race]
  • Reduce Variable Cast Time 1 ~ 5 %
  • Increase ASPD 1 ~ 5 %

 Illusion Silver Guard [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1~2 (x2)

 Imperial Crimson Robe [1]

 Imperial Magic Permit (Armor) (Best Enchants to get are the following below:)

  • Reduces damage taken from [Element] property 1 ~ 5%
  • Reduces damage taken from all property (except neutral 1 ~ 5%
  • Reduces SP consumption 1 ~ 5%
  • MaxHP 1 ~ 5%
  • MaxSP 1 ~ 5%

 Imperial Magic Manteau

 Imperial Magic Permit (Manteau) (Best Enchants to get are the following below:)

  • increases magical damage against [Element] property enemies 1 ~ 5%

Comet Skill Build Notes 
Mage

  • This Skill Build focuses on Firewall and Safetywall, the rest are just pre-requisite counts.
Wizard

  • This Skill Build focuses on Frost Nova and Mystical Amplification, Soul Drain as well.
Warlock

  • This Skill Build focuses on Comet and Soul Expansion and Full throttle for emergencies.

▶ Stats:

STR: 20 ▷ (If you're planning to put this on 0, i am advising you to atleast get x10 Gym passes to compensate for weights)
AGI: 100 ▷ (Having an Average of 175 ASPD and above bypasses alot of animation locks and spams)
VIT: 90 ▷ Focus me 3rd (Survivabilty)
INT: 120 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 120 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 36 ▷ (A little punch of few raw Matk)

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Old Magic Stone Hat [1]

  •  Magic Essence Lv. 1 ~ 5
  •  DEX +1 ~ 5 (x2) or  INT +1 ~ 5 (x2)

 Illusion Morpheus' Hood [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Welding Wand [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • Matk 5 ~ 45
  • Matk% 1 ~ 10%

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increase magic damage to [any element] enemies 3 ~ 20%

3rd Line Enchant

  • Increase magic damage to normal enemies 3 ~ 20%
  • Increase magic damage to boss enemies 3 ~ 20%

 Illusion Thorn Staff of Darkness [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • MATK + 5 ~ 50
  • MATK + 1 ~ 10%

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increases Magical Damage against Medium Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Large Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Reduces After Cast Delay by 1~10%

3rd Line Enchant

  • Any Enchant

4th Line Enchant

  • Magical Damage to Boss Monsters + 1% ~ 15%
  • Magical Damage to Normal Monsters + 1% ~ 15%

 Illusion Engine Wing B-type [1]

  •  Modification Orb (Fast) (x2)
  •  Modification Orb (Above All)

 Illusion Battle Chip R [1]

  •  Spell 5
  •  ASPD Lv. 4
  •  Modification Orb (Magic Healing)

 Magic Intensifier Ring [1]

  • Matk 1 ~ 3% (x2)

 Illusion Leg B-type [1]

  •  Modification Orb (Fixed Casting)
  •  Modification Orb (Spell Buster)
  •  Modification Orb (Vital)

 Magical Booster [1]

  • Matk 1~5
  • Matk 1~3%

 Illusion Armor B-type [1]

  •  Modification Orb (Magic) (x2)
  •  Modification Orb (Delay after skill)

 Illusion Battle Chip L [1]

  •  Spell 5
  •  ASPD Lv. 4
  •  Modification Orb (Magic Soul)
  • Alternatively you can go INT or DEX (x3)

 Temporal Boots Of Dexterity [1]

  •  Spell 2 ~ 5 or  ASPD Lv. 1 ~ 4
  •  Runaway Magic

 Illusion Silver Guard [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Purified Knight's Shield [1]

1st Line Enchant

  • Increase Magical Damage Against [Race] 1 ~ 5 %

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increase Magical Damage Against [Race] 1 ~ 5 %
  • Increase ASPD 1 ~ 5 %

3rd Line Enchant

  • Bypass Magical Defense of Normal Monster 30 ~ 60 %
  • Bypass Magical Defense of Boss Monster 30 ~ 60 %

 King Schmidt's Divine Power Insignia [1]

  •  Divine Power
  •  Spell 4 ~ 5
  •  DEX +3 ~ 5 or  INT +3 ~ 5

  • Matk +1 ~ 3%

or

  • Reduces After Cast Delay 2 ~ 3 %

or a mix of both.

Stats:

STR: 0 ▷ At this point you should have used Gympasses already to compensate lost points in STR
AGI: 120 ▷ If you have an Agi Jewel you can put the status points in LUK or VIT
VIT: 54 ▷ Focus me 3rd (The best offense is the best defense)
INT: 130 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 130 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 7 ▷ What's left of the status points goes here

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Illusion Morpheus' Hood [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Illusion Thorn Staff of Darkness [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • MATK + 5 ~ 50
  • MATK + 1 ~ 10%

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increases Magical Damage against Medium Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Large Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Reduces After Cast Delay by 1 ~ 10%

3rd Line Enchant

  • Any Enchant

4th Line Enchant

  • Magical Damage to Boss Monsters + 1% ~ 15%
  • Magical Damage to Normal Monsters + 1% ~ 15%

  • MATK+ 1 ~ 6%
  • Matk+ 5 ~ 40
  • Reduce After Cast Delay 3 ~ 15%

  •  Happiness Lv 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

  •  Happiness Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%
  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10
  • MATK + 1 ~ 3%

or a mix of both.

  • MATK + 1 ~ 3% x2

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10 x2

or a mix of both.

  •  Automatic Module (Delay after skill)

  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell)

STR: 0 ▷ At this point you should have used Gympasses already to compensate lost points in STR
AGI: 120 ▷ If you have an Agi Jewel you can put the status points in LUK or VIT
VIT: 54 ▷ Focus me 3rd (The best offense is the best defense)
INT: 130 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 130 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 7 ▷ What's left of the status points goes here

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Illusion Morpheus' Hood [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Illusion Thorn Staff of Darkness [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • MATK + 5 ~ 50
  • MATK + 1 ~ 10%

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increases Magical Damage against Medium Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Large Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Reduces After Cast Delay by 1 ~ 10%

3rd Line Enchant

  • Any Enchant

4th Line Enchant

  • Magical Damage to Boss Monsters + 1% ~ 15%
  • Magical Damage to Normal Monsters + 1% ~ 15%

 Temporal Int Manteau [1]

  • MATK+ 1 ~ 6%
  • Matk+ 5 ~ 40
  • Reduce After Cast Delay 3 ~ 15%

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Ring [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Necklace [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Victory Wing Ears [1]

  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%
  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10
  • MATK + 1 ~ 3%

or a mix of both.

 Deep Blue Sunglasses [1]

  • MATK + 1 ~ 3% x2

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10 x2

or a mix of both.

 Automatic Armor B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module ( Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Delay after skill)

or

  •  Automatic Module ( Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell)

 Illusion Silver Guard [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Temporal Boots Of Intelligence [1]

  •  Spell 2 ~ 5 or  ASPD Lv. 1 ~ 4
  •  Runaway Magic

▶ Skills

Comet Skill Build Notes 
Mage

  • This Skill Build focuses on Firewall and Safetywall, the rest are just pre-requisite counts.
Wizard

  • This Skill Build focuses on Frost Nova and Mystical Amplification, Soul Drain as well.
Warlock

  • This Skill Build focuses on Comet and Soul Expansion and Full throttle for emergencies.
Stage 6 [ Nebula + Snow Flower]
▶ Upper: +11  Illusion Morpheus' Hood [1]

▶ Lower:  CD in Mouth Type K

or  Magical Rosary In Mouth

R Acc: -
L Acc: -

▶ Stats:

STR: 30 ▷ (Only for Weight)
AGI: 50 ▷ (What's left of the points / or put everything on int/dex/vit to 99)
VIT: 70 ▷ Focus me 3rd (Survivabilty)
INT: 90 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 90 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 0 ▷ (Not important at the moment, feel free to ignore for now)

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

x

  • Nothing to Enchant at this stage (Unless you went for the Noblesse > Imperial > Grace path)

▶ Skills

Comet Skill Build Notes 
Mage

  • This Skill Build focuses on Firewall and Safetywall, the rest are just pre-requisite counts.
Wizard

  • This Skill Build focuses on Frost Nova and Mystical Amplification, Soul Drain as well.
Warlock

  • This Skill Build focuses on Comet and Soul Expansion and Full throttle for emergencies.

Early Game [ Soul Vulcan Strike ]
▶ Upper: +11  Illusion Morpheus' Hood [1]

▶ Lower:  CD in Mouth Type K

or  Magical Rosary In Mouth

▶ R Hand: +15  Illusion Thorn Staff of Darkness [2]

▶ Garment: +12  Temporal Int Manteau [1]

▶ R Acc:  Brilliant Light Sapphire Ring [1]

▶ Mid: Deep Blue Sunglasses [1]

or  Victory Wing Ears [1]

▶ Armor: +12  Automatic Armor B-type [1]

▶ L Hand: +11  Illusion Silver Guard [1]

▶ Footgear: +11  Automatic Leg B-type [1]

▶ L Acc:  Brilliant Light Sapphire Necklace [1]

Shadow / Costume Stones
▶ Upper:  Magic Power Amber [U]

▶ Lower:  Magic Power Amber [L]

▶ R Hand: +10  Strain Shadow Gauntlet

or +10  Warlock Shadow Glove

▶ Garment:  ASPD Onyx [G]

▶ R Acc: +10  Almighty Shadow Focus

▶ Armor: +9  Reload Shadow Armor ll

or +10  Warlock Shadow Book

▶ CARDS
Upper:  Lichtern Green Card or  Pierrotzoist Card
Mid:  Lichtern Green Card
Low: -
Armor:  Sweet Nightmare Card or  Agav Card or (Any Element Armor Enchant Card)
R Hand:  Mutated White Knight Card x2
L Hand:  Mutated Khalitzburg Card
Garment:  Cave Flower Card
Footgear:  Nightmare Verit Card
R Acc:  Elvira Card
L Acc:  Elvira Card


Stats:

STR: 0 ▷ At this point you should have used Gympasses already to compensate lost points in STR
AGI: 120 ▷ If you have an Agi Jewel you can put the status points in LUK or VIT
VIT: 54 ▷ Focus me 3rd (The best offense is the best defense)
INT: 130 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 130 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 7 ▷ What's left of the status points goes here

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Illusion Morpheus' Hood [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Illusion Thorn Staff of Darkness [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • MATK + 5 ~ 50
  • MATK + 1 ~ 10%

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increases Magical Damage against Medium Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Large Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Reduces After Cast Delay by 1 ~ 10%

3rd Line Enchant

  • Any Enchant

4th Line Enchant

  • Magical Damage to Boss Monsters + 1% ~ 15%
  • Magical Damage to Normal Monsters + 1% ~ 15%

 Temporal Int Manteau [1]

  • MATK+ 1 ~ 6%
  • Matk+ 5 ~ 40
  • Reduce After Cast Delay 3 ~ 15%

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Ring [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Necklace [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Victory Wing Ears [1]

  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%
  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10
  • MATK + 1 ~ 3%

or a mix of both.

 Deep Blue Sunglasses [1]

  • MATK + 1 ~ 3% x2

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10 x2

or a mix of both.

 Automatic Armor B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Delay after skill)

or

  •  Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell)

or

  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Magic)

 Illusion Silver Guard [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Automatic Leg B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module (Spell Buster)
  •  Automatic Module (Lucky Strike)
  •  Automatic Module (Fixed Casting)

▶ Skills

Soul Vulcan Strike Skill Build Notes 
Mage

  • This Skill Build focuses on Total SP and SP Generations as well as Safetywall, the rest are just pre-requisite counts.
Wizard

  • This Skill Build focuses on Fire pillar,Frost Nova and Mystical Amplification, Soul Drain as well to compensate sp lost.
Warlock

  • This Skill Build focuses on Itense Telekenesis to buff 4th job skill, Drain life for Sustainability and comet for debuff only.
Archmage

  • This Skill Build is focused on the Entire Fire skill tree + Soul Vulcan Strike and Rock Down as alternative damage, Deadly projection against Magic immunities.
Mid Game [ Soul Vulcan Strike ]
▶ Upper: +12  Thanos Magic Helmet-LT [1]

or +12  Bacsojin Hat-LT [1]

▶ Lower:  Magical Rosary In Mouth
or  Vicious Mind Aura

▶ R Hand: +12  Thanatos Two-handed Staff-AD [2]
or +12  Blue Crystal Staff-LT [2]

▶ Garment: +12  Temporal Int Manteau [1]
or +12  Fallen Warrior Manteau [1]

▶ R Acc:  Brilliant Light Sapphire Ring [1]
or  Sinful Sapphire Ring [1]

▶ Mid: Magical Booster [1]

or  Victory Wing Ears [1]
or  Deep Blue Sunglasses [1]

▶ Armor: +12  Automatic Armor B-type [1]

▶ L Hand: +12  Thanatos Two-handed Staff-AD [2]
or +12  Blue Crystal Staff-LT [2]

▶ Footgear: +11  Automatic Leg B-type [1]
or +12  Hero Boots-LT [1]

▶ L Acc:  Brilliant Light Sapphire Necklace [1]
or  Sinful Sapphire Necklace [1]

Shadow / Costume Stones
▶ Upper:  Magic Power Amber [U]

▶ Lower:  Magic Power Amber [L]

▶ R Hand:
+10  Magic Exorcist Corrupt Shadow Gauntlet
or
+10  Magic Executioner Holy Water Shadow Gauntlet
or
Any Other Race Specific Gauntlet's

▶ Garment:  Casting Onyx [G]

▶ R Acc: +10  Tempest Shadow Focus

▶ Mid:  Magic Power Amber [M]

▶ Armor:
+10  Magic Fishing Insect Net Shadow Robe
or
+10  Magic Scissor Hunting Shadow Armor
or
Any Other Race Penetration Armor's

▶ L Hand: +10  Tempest Shadow Shield

▶ Footgear: +10  Tempest Shadow Shoes

▶ L Acc: +10  Tempest Shadow Brooch

▶ CARDS
Upper:  Lichtern Green Card or  Pierrotzoist Card
Mid:  Lichtern Green Card
Low: -
Armor:  Sweet Nightmare Card or  Agav Card or (Any Element Armor Enchant Card)
R Hand:  Mutated White Knight Card x2
L Hand:  Mutated Khalitzburg Card
Garment:  Cave Flower Card
Footgear:  Nightmare Verit Card
R Acc:  Elvira Card
L Acc:  Elvira Card


Stats:

STR: 10 ▷ (Again If you're planning to put this on 0, i am advising you to atleast get x10 Gym passes to compensate for weights)
AGI: 120 ▷ (With the right amount of consumables and party buffs you should be able to get 190+ ASPD)
VIT: 100 ▷ Focus me 3rd (Tanky enough for End-game instances)
INT: 120 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 120 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 59 ▷ (A few more punches of raw Matk)

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Thanos Magic Helmet-LT [1]

  •  Magic Essence Lv. 1 ~ 3
  •  Gray Spell (Magic) Lv. 1 ~ 3

 Blue Crystal Staff-LT [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • MATK + 5 ~ 45
  • Variable Casting time 5 ~ 20%
  • Increases Ghost Property Magical Damage by 3 ~ 15%

2nd Line Enchant

  • MATK + 3 ~ 7%
  • ACD + 1 ~ 5%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Normal Monsters by 5 ~ 20%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Boss Monsters by 5 ~ 20%

 Thanatos Two-handed Staff-AD [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • ACD + 1 ~ 5%
  • Variable Casting time 5 ~ 10%
  • Increase Magic Damage to Undead Property by 1 ~ 20%

2nd Line Enchant

  • MATK + 3 ~ 7%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Normal Monsters by 5 ~ 10%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Boss Monsters by 5 ~ 10%

 Hero Boots-LT [1]

  •  Knowledge of Wise Man
  •  Spell 1 ~ 4
  •  INT +1 ~ 5

 Temporal Int Manteau [1]

  • MATK+ 1 ~ 6%
  • Matk+ 5 ~ 40
  • Reduce After Cast Delay 3 ~ 15%

 Magical Booster [1]

  • Matk +3 ~ 5
  • Matk +1 ~ 3%

or

  • Reduces After Cast Delay 1 ~ 2 %
  • Reduces After Cast Delay 2 ~ 3 %

or a mix of both.

 Victory Wing Ears [1]

  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%
  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10
  • MATK + 1 ~ 3%

or a mix of both.

 Deep Blue Sunglasses [1]

  • MATK + 1 ~ 3% x2

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10 x2

or a mix of both.

 Automatic Armor B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell)

or

  •  Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Delay after skill)

or

  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Magic)

 Automatic Leg B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module (Spell Buster)
  •  Automatic Module (Lucky Strike)
  •  Automatic Module (Fixed Casting)

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Ring [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Necklace [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Sinful Sapphire Ring [1]

  •  Horror Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Dragon Scale Lv 3 ~ 5

 Sinful Sapphire Necklace [1]

  •  Horror Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Dragon Scale Lv 3 ~ 5

▶ Skills

Soul Vulcan Strike Skill Build Notes 
Mage

  • This Skill Build focuses on Total SP and SP Generations as well as Safetywall, the rest are just pre-requisite counts.
Wizard

  • This Skill Build focuses on Fire pillar,Frost Nova and Mystical Amplification, Soul Drain as well to compensate sp lost.
Warlock

  • This Skill Build focuses on Itense Telekenesis to buff 4th job skill, Drain life for Sustainability and comet for debuff only.
Archmage

  • This Skill Build is focused on the Entire Fire skill tree + Soul Vulcan Strike and Rock Down as alternative damage, Deadly projection against Magic immunities.
Late Game [ Soul Vulcan Strike ]
Upper: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Lower:  Magical Rosary in Mouth

R Hand: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Garment: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

R Acc: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Footgear: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Stats:

STR: 0 ▷ At this point you should have used Gympasses already to compensate lost points in STR
AGI: 120 ▷ If you have an Agi Jewel you can put the status points in LUK or VIT
VIT: 54 ▷ Focus me 3rd (The best offense is the best defense)
INT: 130 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 130 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 7 ▷ What's left of the status points goes here

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Illusion Morpheus' Hood [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Illusion Thorn Staff of Darkness [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • MATK + 5 ~ 50
  • MATK + 1 ~ 10%

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increases Magical Damage against Medium Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Large Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Reduces After Cast Delay by 1 ~ 10%

3rd Line Enchant

  • Any Enchant

4th Line Enchant

  • Magical Damage to Boss Monsters + 1% ~ 15%
  • Magical Damage to Normal Monsters + 1% ~ 15%

 Temporal Int Manteau [1]

  • MATK+ 1 ~ 6%
  • Matk+ 5 ~ 40
  • Reduce After Cast Delay 3 ~ 15%

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Ring [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Necklace [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Victory Wing Ears [1]

  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%
  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10
  • MATK + 1 ~ 3%

or a mix of both.

 Deep Blue Sunglasses [1]

  • MATK + 1 ~ 3% x2

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10 x2

or a mix of both.

 Automatic Armor B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Delay after skill)

or

  •  Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell)

or

  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Magic)

 Illusion Silver Guard [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Automatic Leg B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module (Spell Buster)
  •  Automatic Module (Lucky Strike)
  •  Automatic Module (Fixed Casting)

▶ Skills

Crimson Arrow Skill Build Notes 
Mage

  • This Skill Build focuses on Total SP and SP Generations as well as Safetywall, the rest are just pre-requisite counts.
Wizard

  • This Skill Build focuses on Fire pillar,Frost Nova and Mystical Amplification, Soul Drain as well to compensate sp lost.
Warlock

  • This Skill Build focuses on Itense Telekenesis to buff 4th job skill, Drain life for Sustainability and comet for debuff only.
Archmage

  • This Skill Build is focused on the Entire Fire skill tree + Soul Vulcan Strike and Rock Down as alternative damage, Deadly projection against Magic immunities.

or +12  Bacsojin Hat-LT [1]

Archmage

Shadow / Costume Stones
▶ Upper:  Magic Power Amber [U]

▶ Lower:  Magic Power Amber [L]

▶ R Hand:
+10  Magic Exorcist Corrupt Shadow Gauntlet
or
+10  Magic Executioner Holy Water Shadow Gauntlet
or
Any Other Race Specific Gauntlet's

▶ Garment:  Casting Onyx [G]

▶ R Acc: +10  Tempest Shadow Focus

▶ Mid:  Magic Power Amber [M]

▶ Armor:
+10  Magic Fishing Insect Net Shadow Robe
or
+10  Magic Scissor Hunting Shadow Armor
or
Any Other Race Penetration Armor's

▶ L Hand: +10  Tempest Shadow Shield

▶ Footgear: +10  Tempest Shadow Shoes

▶ L Acc: +10  Tempest Shadow Brooch

▶ CARDS
Upper:  Lichtern Blue Card
Mid:  Vanilaqus Card
Low: -
Armor:  Sweet Nightmare Card or  Agav Card or (Any Element Armor Enchant Card)
R Hand:  Mutated White Knight Card x2
L Hand:  Mutated Khalitzburg Card
Garment:  Faceworm Larvae Card
Footgear:  Nightmare Verit Card
R Acc:  Headless Mule Card
L Acc:  Headless Mule Card


Stats:

STR: 10 ▷ (Again If you're planning to put this on 0, i am advising you to atleast get x10 Gym passes to compensate for weights)
AGI: 120 ▷ (With the right amount of consumables and party buffs you should be able to get 190+ ASPD)
VIT: 100 ▷ Focus me 3rd (Tanky enough for End-game instances)
INT: 120 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 120 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 59 ▷ (A few more punches of raw Matk)

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Thanos Magic Helmet-LT [1]

  •  Magic Essence Lv. 1 ~ 3
  •  Gray Spell (Magic) Lv. 1 ~ 3

 Blue Crystal Staff-LT [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • MATK + 5 ~ 45
  • Variable Casting time 5 ~ 20%
  • Increases Water Property Magical Damage by 3 ~ 15%

2nd Line Enchant

  • MATK + 3 ~ 7%
  • ACD + 1 ~ 5%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Normal Monsters by 5 ~ 20%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Boss Monsters by 5 ~ 20%

 Thanatos Two-handed Staff-AD [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • ACD + 1 ~ 5%
  • Variable Casting time 5 ~ 10%
  • Increase Magic Damage to Undead Property by 1 ~ 20%

2nd Line Enchant

  • MATK + 3 ~ 7%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Normal Monsters by 5 ~ 10%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Boss Monsters by 5 ~ 10%

 Hero Boots-LT [1]

  •  Knowledge of Wise Man
  •  Spell 1 ~ 4
  •  INT +1 ~ 5

 Magical Booster [1]

  • Matk +3 ~ 5
  • Matk +1 ~ 3%

or

  • Reduces After Cast Delay 1 ~ 2 %
  • Reduces After Cast Delay 2 ~ 3 %

or a mix of both.

 Victory Wing Ears [1]

  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%
  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10
  • MATK + 1 ~ 3%

or a mix of both.

 Deep Blue Sunglasses [1]

  • MATK + 1 ~ 3% x2

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10 x2

or a mix of both.

 Automatic Armor B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell)

or

  •  Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Delay after skill)

or

  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Magic)

 Automatic Leg B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module (Spell Buster)
  •  Automatic Module (Lucky Strike)
  •  Automatic Module (Fixed Casting)

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Ring [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Necklace [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Sinful Sapphire Ring [1]

  •  Horror Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Dragon Scale Lv 3 ~ 5

 Sinful Sapphire Necklace [1]

  •  Horror Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Dragon Scale Lv 3 ~ 5

▶ Skills

Frozen Slash Skill Build Notes 
Mage

  • This Skill Build focuses on Total SP and SP Generations as well as Safetywall, the rest are just pre-requisite counts.
Wizard

  • This Skill Build focuses on Fire pillar,Frost Nova and Mystical Amplification, Soul Drain as well to compensate sp lost.
Warlock

  • This Skill Build focuses on Itense Telekenesis to buff 4th job skill, Drain life for Sustainability and comet for debuff only.
Archmage

  • This Skill Build is focused on the Entire Water skill tree + Soul Vulcan Strike as alternative damage, Deadly projection against Magic immunities and Destructive hurricane for buffs only.
Late Game [ Frozen Slash ]
Upper: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Lower:  Magical Rosary in Mouth

R Hand: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Garment: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

R Acc: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Phrixi Felatine's Model| Mid: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Armor: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

L Hand: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Footgear: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

L Acc: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Upper: +11  Welding Wand [2 [1]]
Mid: +11  Welding Wand [2 [1]]
Armor: +11  Welding Wand [2 [1]]
R Hand: +11  Welding Wand [2 [1]]
L Hand: +11  Welding Wand [2 [1]]
Garment: +11  Welding Wand [2 [1]]
Footgear: +11  Welding Wand [2 [1]]
R Acc: +11  Welding Wand [2 [1]]
L Acc:+11  Welding Wand [2 [1]]
Shadow Armor: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]
Shadow R Hand: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]
Shadow L Hand: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]
Shadow Footgear: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]
R Shadow Acc: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]
L Shadow Acc: +11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

Alternate Items:

+11  CWelding Wand [2 [1]]

  • Storm Cannon [Updated as of: 01/06/23]★
Early Game [ Storm Cannon ]
▶ Upper: +11  Illusion Morpheus' Hood [1]

▶ Lower:  CD in Mouth Type K

or  Magical Rosary In Mouth

▶ R Hand: +15  Illusion Thorn Staff of Darkness [2]

▶ Garment: +12  Temporal Int Manteau [1]

▶ R Acc:  Brilliant Light Sapphire Ring [1]

▶ Mid: Deep Blue Sunglasses [1]

or  Victory Wing Ears [1]

▶ Armor: +12  Automatic Armor B-type [1]

▶ L Hand: +11  Illusion Silver Guard [1]

▶ Footgear: +11  Automatic Leg B-type [1]

▶ L Acc:  Brilliant Light Sapphire Necklace [1]

Shadow / Costume Stones
▶ Upper:  Magic Power Amber [U]

▶ Lower:  Magic Power Amber [L]

▶ R Hand: +10  Strain Shadow Gauntlet

or +10  Warlock Shadow Glove

▶ Garment:  ASPD Onyx [G]

▶ R Acc: +10  Almighty Shadow Focus

▶ Mid:  Magic Power Amber [M]

▶ Armor: +9  Reload Shadow Armor ll

▶ L Hand: +10  Jack Shadow Book

or +10  Warlock Shadow Book

▶ Footgear: +9  All Race Shadow Boots

▶ L Acc: +10  Almighty Shadow Brooch

▶ CARDS
Upper:  Tikbalang Card
Mid:  Litus Card
Low: -
Armor:  Sweet Nightmare Card or  Agav Card or (Any Element Armor Enchant Card)
R Hand:  Mutated White Knight Card x2
L Hand:  Mutated Khalitzburg Card
Garment:  Deep Sea Phen Card
Footgear:  Nightmare Verit Card
R Acc:  Elvira Card
L Acc:  Elvira Card


Stats:

STR: 0 ▷ At this point you should have used Gympasses already to compensate lost points in STR
AGI: 120 ▷ If you have an Agi Jewel you can put the status points in LUK or VIT
VIT: 54 ▷ Focus me 3rd (The best offense is the best defense)
INT: 130 ▷ Focus me 1st (Damage/x1 Casting)
DEX: 130 ▷ Focus me 2nd (x2 Casting)
LUK: 7 ▷ What's left of the status points goes here

▶ Enchants

Equipments Enchants

 Illusion Morpheus' Hood [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Illusion Thorn Staff of Darkness [2]

1st Line Enchant

  • MATK + 5 ~ 50
  • MATK + 1 ~ 10%

2nd Line Enchant

  • Increases Magical Damage against Medium Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Increases Magical Damage against Large Monsters by 1 ~ 10%
  • Reduces After Cast Delay by 1 ~ 10%

3rd Line Enchant

  • Any Enchant

4th Line Enchant

  • Magical Damage to Boss Monsters + 1% ~ 15%
  • Magical Damage to Normal Monsters + 1% ~ 15%

 Temporal Int Manteau [1]

  • MATK+ 1 ~ 6%
  • Matk+ 5 ~ 40
  • Reduce After Cast Delay 3 ~ 15%

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Ring [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Brilliant Light Sapphire Necklace [1]

  •  Happiness Lv 3 ~ 5
  •  Destructive Evil Lv 3 ~ 5

 Victory Wing Ears [1]

  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%
  • Reduces Delay After Skill by 1 ~ 3%

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10
  • MATK + 1 ~ 3%

or a mix of both.

 Deep Blue Sunglasses [1]

  • MATK + 1 ~ 3% x2

or

  • MATK + 1 ~ 10 x2

or a mix of both.

 Automatic Armor B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Delay after skill)

or

  •  Automatic Module (Magic) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell)

or

  •  Automatic Module (Shadow Spell) x2
  •  Automatic Module (Magic)

 Illusion Silver Guard [1]

  •  Spellbound Nive Lv 1 ~ 2 (x2)

 Automatic Leg B-type [1]

  •  Automatic Module (Spell Buster)
  •  Automatic Module (Lucky Strike)
  •  Automatic Module (Fixed Casting)

▶ Skills

Storm Cannon Skill Build Notes 
Mage

  • This Skill Build focuses on Total SP and SP Generations as well as Safetywall, the rest are just pre-requisite counts.
Wizard

  • This Skill Build focuses on Fire pillar,Frost Nova and Mystical Amplification, Soul Drain as well to compensate sp lost.
Warlock

  • This Skill Build focuses on Itense Telekenesis to buff 4th job skill, Drain life for Sustainability and comet for debuff only.
Archmage

  • This Skill Build is focused on the Entire Wind skill tree + Soul Vulcan Strike as Secondary damage, Deadly projection against Magic immunities and Frozen slash for AP recovery, Crystal Impact for buffs only.
Mid Game [ Storm Cannon ]
▶ Upper: +12  Thanos Magic Helmet-LT [1]

or +12  Bacsojin Hat-LT [1]

▶ Lower:  Magical Rosary In Mouth
or  Vicious Mind Aura

▶ R Hand: +12  Thanatos Two-handed Staff-AD [2]
or +12  Blue Crystal Staff-LT [2]

▶ Garment: +12  Temporal Int Manteau [1]
or +12  Fallen Warrior Manteau [1]

▶ R Acc:  Brilliant Light Sapphire Ring [1]
or  Sinful Sapphire Ring [1]

▶ Mid: Magical Booster [1]

or  Victory Wing Ears [1]
or  Deep Blue Sunglasses [1]

▶ Armor: +12  Automatic Armor B-type [1]

▶ L Hand: +12  Thanatos Two-handed Staff-AD [2]
or +12  Blue Crystal Staff-LT [2]

▶ Footgear: +11  Automatic Leg B-type [1]
or +12  Hero Boots-LT [1]

▶ L Acc:  Brilliant Light Sapphire Necklace [1]
or  Sinful Sapphire Necklace [1]

  • This Skill Build is focused on the Entire Wind skill tree + Soul Vulcan Strike as Secondary damage, Deadly projection against Magic immunities and Frozen slash for AP recovery, Crystal Impact for buffs only.

▶ Skills

Rock Down Skill Build Notes 
Mage

  • This Skill Build focuses on Total SP and SP Generations as well as Safetywall, the rest are just pre-requisite counts.
Wizard

  • This Skill Build focuses on Fire pillar,Frost Nova and Mystical Amplification, Soul Drain as well to compensate sp lost.
Warlock

  • This Skill Build focuses on Itense Telekenesis to buff 4th job skill, Drain life for Sustainability and comet for debuff only.
Archmage

  • This Skill Build is focused on the Entire Earth skill tree + Soul Vulcan Strike as alternative damage, Deadly projection against Magic immunities and Frozen slash for AP recovery when idle.(no enemies)
Mid Game [ Rock Down ]
▶ Upper: +12  Thanos Magic Helmet-LT [1]

or +12  Bacsojin Hat-LT [1]

▶ Lower:  Magical Rosary In Mouth
or  Vicious Mind Aura
